title: Newspapers: a reading adventure
creator_credit: Stephen Wallen and Alfred Higgins Productions
brief_description: Presents an explanation of the various sections of a newspaper. Shows how a story is gathered and written; the types of articles that are printed; and how to read a paper for maximum information.
description: Presents an explanation of the various sections of a newspaper. Shows how a story is gathered and written; the types of articles that are printed; and how to read a paper for maximum information.
